subject: Science
title: Maxwell's Equations: Unifying the Forces
description: A tiny lesson with a big payoff: Maxwell's Equations: Unifying the Forces.

hook.text: James Clerk Maxwell wrote four equations that unified electricity, magnetism, and light.

buildup.text: In the 1860s, Maxwell combined all known laws of electricity and magnetism into one framework.

discovery.text: His equations predicted electromagnetic waves that travel at the speed of light.

twist.text: Maxwell realized light itself is an electromagnetic wave ‚Äî not a separate phenomenon.

climax.text: His work laid the foundation for radio, TV, Wi-Fi, X-rays, and all wireless communication.

punchline.text: Four equations explain light, radio, and X-rays. Maxwell unified forces with math.

quiz.question: What did Maxwell's equations reveal about light?
options: Light is made of particles only
Light requires a medium to travel
